listing_jobDesc: We are looking for a junior web developer to join our digital department to work and support our internal web development projects. The ideal candidate will be responsible to fuse the art of creative design with programming, integrate UI/UX design, actualize design ideas to final delivery, and provide technical support to other entities. Candidates should be creative, independent, good in communication, and strong in technical skills.*What's required:Web layout, coding, testing, and support for the projects assignedProficiency in HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and MySQLFamiliar with WordPressKnowledge of ASTRA and Flatsome themes preferredKnowledge of Gravity Forms optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of ECommerce templates e.g. Woocommerce optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of Adobe design software optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of basic technical SEO skills optional but will be advantageousHas an eye for good website aesthetics in terms of typography, colors and layouts, etcHas good verbal and written communication skillsAble to work on tight deadlinesAble to optimize websites for performance and security**The ideal candidate should have/be:One year of relevant working experience on web development for WordPress websites.Keen to learn new skillsAble to take ownership and accountability to produce quality websitesCommitted and responsible with a strong work ethicAttention to details and check the work before deliveryA clear understanding of user-centered design**Please apply stating your,Earliest Available Start DatePortfolio/Skills Link*Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Fresh graduatePart-time hours: 48 per weekSalary: $1,200.00 - $2,000.00 per monthSchedule:Flexible hours We are looking for a junior web developer to join our digital department to work and support our internal web development projects. The ideal candidate will be responsible to fuse the art of creative design with programming, integrate UI/UX design, actualize design ideas to final delivery, and provide technical support to other entities. Candidates should be creative, independent, good in communication, and strong in technical skills.*What's required:Web layout, coding, testing, and support for the projects assignedProficiency in HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and MySQLFamiliar with WordPressKnowledge of ASTRA and Flatsome themes preferredKnowledge of Gravity Forms optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of ECommerce templates e.g. Woocommerce optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of Adobe design software optional but will be advantageousKnowledge of basic technical SEO skills optional but will be advantageousHas an eye for good website aesthetics in terms of typography, colors and layouts, etcHas good verbal and written communication skillsAble to work on tight deadlinesAble to optimize websites for performance and security**The ideal candidate should have/be:One year of relevant working experience on web development for WordPress websites.Keen to learn new skillsAble to take ownership and accountability to produce quality websitesCommitted and responsible with a strong work ethicAttention to details and check the work before deliveryA clear understanding of user-centered design**Please apply stating your,Earliest Available Start DatePortfolio/Skills Link*Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Fresh graduatePart-time hours: 48 per weekSalary: $1,200.00 - $2,000.00 per monthSchedule:Flexible hours Show more

Project Location(s):
Indonesia
Job Type:
Full Time
About Us

Established in 2011, Snap Innovations (www.snapinnovations.com) is one of the leading technology company focusing on areas of Artificial Intelligence, Fintech and Blockchain. We aim to be always at the forefront of technologies and seek to break new grounds all the time.

Leveraging our extensive involvement with disruptive technology in the finance and blockchain space, we are uniquely positioned to provide integration of blockchain with business models, ecosystems and strategies of incumbents.

We are now looking for enthusiastic individuals to join our team and help us on the next step of our journey.

Responsibilities

Full-stack web/mobile application development with a variety of languages including but not limited to PHP, JavaScript and Java/Android
Implement web or mobile interfaces using XHTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Work closely with our PM and design teams to define feature specifications and build innovative consumer-facing products
Work closely with operations and infrastructure to build and scale back-end services
Build data feeds and reports interfaces

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science
At least 3-4 years’ of experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Proficiency in at least one server-side technology (Java, PHP, NodeJS, Python, Ruby)
Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work Project Location(s):
Indonesia

Trakomatic is looking for a qualified Jr. Web Developer to join our Engineering team. You will be working with our engineers to develop and maintain high quality mobile applications.If you’re passionate about web application development, we would like to meet you. Who are we?The GrowHub Innovation Company is a Singapore-based agritech firm with an exclusive commercial partnership with the Food Innovation Precinct Western Australia (FIPWA).Currently in eight markets across Australia and Asia Pacific, The Growhub offers access to trusted premium products at affordable rates through agri-food innovations and blockchain technology emerging from our innovation centre at FIPWA. With the capital, network and expertise, we use technology to engage and improve the experience of “farm to fork”.Our data enables producers to improve yields, it optimises distribution andenhances transparency to assure that consumers get what they paid for. Blockchain technology makes food traceable across the supply chain – so that you can trust in the food you eat.As a collective of motivated individuals, we believe in providing opportunities or capable people to exercise their talent and to achieve their potential.We are looking for a Frontend Developer (Internship) who will work with our partners in various countries to develop high quality web solutions. What is in it for the successful candidate : -You will be working in an environment where we treasure diversity and original thinking backed by rigorous analysis. A stipend of up to SGD1,200 will be provided during the attachment. Good performers who successfully graduated will be given preference for future employment with The GrowHub.An exciting career opportunity awaits for those who are up for the challenge. We believe in rewarding strong performers including employee share options. We are a pure play cyber security company with deep engineering capabilities that is looking to hire experienced frontend engineers who can help plan, design, build and implement user interface systems of web-based applications and complex visualisations from our data models. You will act as an intermediaty in bridging the gap between the customers and backend developers and also help enhance the UX/UI of the web applications to improve user's overall satisfaction.

Key responsibilities areas:

Familiarise with Ensign’s business domain and objectives to develop and deploy analytics web applications and visualisations that meet internal business requirements and the needs of partners and customers.
Design intuitive web UI/UX and develop innovative web applications that provide interactive cyber security insights and analytical functions.
Identify and design applications based on complex customer requirements by going through UI/UX and design thinking process
Cooperate with back-end developers on integration to ensure the delivery of a full end-to-end product.

Requirements

Minimum 2 years in frontend development.
Need to have the miminal programming skills to build the web app and visualizations (e.g. Javascript, HTML5/CSS3, etc).
Proficient with the latest Frontend Javascript Frameworks e.g. ReactJS, AngularJS, VueJS.
A creative thinker who understands User Interface design as well as other visualizations skills such as typography, interface design, user experience design and visual art design.

Preferred Skills /Qualities

Excellent technical skills.
Team player and a deep hunger to learn things outside of your comfort zone.
Detail-oriented, solution-focused and problem solver.
Have conducted UI/UX requirements gathering and gone through design thinking processes. RESPONSIBILITIES


Conceptualise and implement design and layout of website according to clients' requirements
Coding is necessary occasionally
Perform checks on websites and identify/rectify technical problems
Work closely with marketing team to develop and maintain company websites

REQUIREMENTS


Degree or Diploma holder in IT, Interactive Media, or Web Design with an understanding of design, layout and web usability
Knowledgeable in Web development languages such as PHP, Javascript, JQuery, HTML5, HTML, CSS, and CMS platform
Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meeting tight deadlines
Detail oriented, self-motivated, resourceful and independent
Flexible and willing to learn
Possess good interpersonal and communication skills
Possess good communication skills in English (Able to Read and Write fluently)
Preferably 1 year of relevant experience
1 year contract, convertible to a full time position depending on the performance

COMPANY DESCRIPTION
Beyondsoft International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. was set up in 2007 and established as the regional headquarters for the Southeast Asia (SEA) and European markets in September 2015. Based on our vision of "Using technology to promote social progress, economic development and become a global customer preferred partner" and our concept of "Beyond your expectations", Beyondsoft is committed to provide our customers in countries along the "Belt and Road" with comprehensive solutions and products and creating commercial value for customers to realizing continuous businesses development.

Our core business includes:

IT development servicesProviding customers with IT consulting, software research and development, software and hardware testing, system integration and operation and maintenance, data analysis and other services;
New retail solutions and productsThrough intelligent products, helping small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) realize the digital transformation of their daily operations;
Internet of Things (IoT) platform and solutionsComprehensive use of IoT, artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing and other technologies to provide IoT solutions for intelligent upgrades in cities, parks, buildings and industries, to create a smart future.

For more information, please visit www.beyondsoft.com.

Frontend Developer

EightX Lifestyle is leading a revolution in the lifestyle space, with a critical focus on F&B and technology in our current growth phase. With five Lifestyle Hubs (and many more to come), Singapore's largest microbrewery, and a vision to become Singapore's leading lifestyle brand community. We are looking for a developer who loves front-end development and is passionate about user experience. We believe that a clean, user-friendly interface is all that matters to the end-user at the end of the day. We seek a special breed of developers who live and breathe simple yet sophisticated user interface design and take user experience to heart. As a company, we love designing and developing state-of-the-art interfaces with amazing animations while providing the best experience for users.

Responsibilities
Architect efficient and reusable frontend systems that drive complex web applications
Writing high-quality, clean, and maintainable code using engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, design patterns, etc.)
Develop clean and user-centric user interfaces
Optimisation of technical aspects of web SEO
Collaborate with the design team and other software engineers to design, build, enhance, and test new features
Keep at the forefront of emerging web-based technologies and trends

Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or similar
At least three years of commercial experience in frontend web development
Strong proficiency with fundamental frontend languages including HTML, CSS and JavaScript/Typescript.
Strong proficiency in any frontend frameworks such as Vue, Nuxt, React and Angular. Vue/Nuxt is preferred
Proficiency in integrating with backend services using REST/GraphQL API
Experience in writing unit, integration and E2E tests using frameworks like Jest, Cypress, etc.
Good sense of UI and UX design
Strong understanding of responsive design

Good to have
Providing a portfolio or screenshots of past work would be a benefit
Including your personal GitHub account in your resume
Professional experience in using any strong typed languages.
Experience in using animation libraries such as GSAP, anime.js, etc.
Knowledge of AWS backend development would be a plus but not required. Frontend Developer

Company Profile
RPAT is an HR-IT Valued Acceleration Platform and Solutions Architect. We aim to reduce recruitment incompatibilities through innovative solutions and programs.
Job Description
RPAT Pte Ltd is a growing ICT and employment solutions expert. We have a diverse portfolio from web designing & development to recruitment & HR advisory and even virtual event planning. We are currently developing our team and welcome you to apply for our Junior Web Developer position.
As a Junior Web Developer, you will report to the Project Director and work closely with the Development & Design Team. You will be involved mainly in full-stack development and critical in developing portals and applications for internal & external projects.
Back-end and front-end programming in PHP, JavaScript & other frameworks as required.
Brainstorm and research new creative tech ideas with our product development team.
Evaluate and provide solutions & technical feedback on project requirements and problems.
Attend client requirement meetings with the project manager.
Execute test scripts and create logs to document testing phases and defects found.
Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing.
Requirements:
Proficient in fundamental back & front-end languages such as PHP, HTML, CSS or JavaScript.
At least 1 year of programming experience
Diploma in Computer Science or other relevant fields
Independent & proactive
Positive attitude and willingness to learn new programming languages

Application Instructions
You will have a higher chance of consideration by applying for this position following the link here:


https://talenttribe.asia/jobs/rpat/junior-web-developer-Uump9D

Interested Applicant, pls whatsapp us at 98363756 for instant interview

Job Summary
Allied Container Group is a leading container haulage operator and yard operator founded in Singapore in 1975. We are dedicated in using technology to improve the lives of small businesses and consumers in the logistics sector.

As part of the Technology & Operations team, we are looking for a developer to work in enterprise application development and deployment.

Responsibilities
1. Develop and maintain web services to support business function and maximize performance and quality
2. Work with project team members to identify product requirements and define scope
3. Collaborate with UI/UX team to ensure consistency in design
4. Monitor and manage Cloud systems
5. Document product and project information

Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
2. Hands-on development in PHP and strong understanding of PHP frameworks
3. Strong knowledge in frontend design (HTML/CSS/JS and related frameworks).
4. Good knowledge of databases like MySQL and others (NoSQL knowledge is a plus).
5. Experience in Git, SVN
6. Fundamental appreciation of UI/UX practices
7. Understanding of Cloud services e.g. AWS, Azure
8. Understanding of system testing, automated testing is a plus.

Why Should You Apply?
Successful candidate can expect an attractive compensation package and good career advancement opportunity.

COVID-19 considerations:
Appropriate COVID-19 safe management measures have been implemented to protect customers and delivery partners Interested Applicant, pls whatsapp us at 98363756 for instant interview

Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:
MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture
Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:
Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.
Learning Outcomes & Objectives:
Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary
Requirements:
Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently
Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:
5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000/Month (University)
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)
Why Choose Us:
Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep
Application:
Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:
1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:
Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face

Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.
Learning Outcomes & Objectives:
Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary
Requirements:
Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently
Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:
5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000/Month (University)
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)
Why Choose Us:
Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep
Application:
Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:
1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:
Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection Show more

In2 is a data-driven experiential agency that specialises in delivering a comprehensive mix of on-ground activation and digital marketing campaigns to translate our client's brand story into a relevant, meaningful and memorable experience for their customers. We are entrusted with the reputation of Fortune 100 companies as well as promising SMEs around the region. So if you are keen to design cutting-edge solutions that can push a brand forward and back that up with some good old-fashioned hard work, we have an opening that will suit you.

A. Job Purpose
The front end developer works closely with the Art Department to develop web and mobile sites, email marketing and other digital touch points.

B. Roles and Responsibilities
Understand digital media design principles, UX and UI and brainstorm with designers on the best practices and approach to create engaging HTML experience across all devices
Develop website using standard HTML/CSS and JS/jQuery practices on Bootstrap framework
Create digital media assets like websites, microsites, mobile responsive web, interactive banners and marketing emails (eDM)
Recommend, implement and manage CMS-based website such as WordPress
Diagnose, debug, troubleshoot, and fix the configuration and integration issues while working in tandem with internal technical team and external media agencies
Fully test and QC all work to ensure it is suitably prepared for presentation by the project manager to client
Make sure that all work produced is to a high standard and within brand guidelines and specifications
C. Qualification and Experience
Two or more years of proven hands-on experience in front end (HTML) web development
Diploma or bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics or equivalent
Certification in Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager is a bonus
D. Knowledge, Skills and Attributes
Willing to put forward ideas and have a keen eye for details
A natural inclination for a mobile-first approach
Proven experience in CSS/(X)HTML: HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, CSS media queries, Javascript, jQuery, professional-level hand coded HTML and CSS skills, along with the ability to hand code from Photoshop mock-ups
Knowledge of JavaScript and an understanding of popular libraries and frameworks
Well-versed in HTML coding of websites, microsites, mobile responsive web, interactive banners and marketing emails (eDM)
Proficiency in developing websites using CMS (Wordpress, Joomla) and responsive cross-platform HTML pages
Working knowledge of CSS framework such as Bootstrap and Foundation
Experience in placing proper meta tags in HTML for SEO
Basic knowledge of PHP and MySQL database is a plus
Candidates with certification in Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager will be prioritised In2 is a data-driven experiential agency that specialises in delivering a comprehensive mix of on-ground activation and digital marketing campaigns to translate our client's brand story into a relevant, meaningful and memorable experience for their customers. Description
We are looking for a Junior Frontend Developer to join our team in Singapore.
As a UI developer, you will collaborate with designers to create outstanding user experiences for the music community. Along the way, you will learn some of the most interesting techniques around signal processing and audio.
Responsibilities
Develop BandLab web applications and our internal tools
Work with UI/UX designers to implement changes and new features
Troubleshoot and resolve issues with existing codes
Participate in code reviews
Maintain codebase and build tools
Monitor application stability and security
Requirements
Fluent in HTML/CSS + JavaScript
Curious about web performances and accessibility
Willingness to learn in depth: SCSS, Vue, Vite, Rollup, Gulp, Git
Advanced usage of debugging and profiling tools
Knowledge about the current state of front-end development
Understanding of Node.js and npm ecosystem for front-end purpose
Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical individuals
Familiarity with audio processing is a plus Description

ECHOL TECH –_ A Team of Technology Architect at Work!_About UsEchol was established in 2007 in Singapore as an innovative solution specialist focusing on assets tracking and management. As of date, Echol has been extremely successful and have also expanded into Visual Analytics and AI. As such, we will be expanding our team! An Echol Full Stack Developer will be responsible for both front and back-end web development, integration of hardware as well as overseeing end-to-end developments. At Echol, we believe technology exists to empower human capabilities. We provide solutions that help Companies in monitoring, tracking, and protecting their assets. Our Data-Mining ability has been proven to help many Companies transcend their businessOur TeamWe do not believe in hierarchy here at Echol. We learn, grow and support each other as a Team. We believe in having open channel of communication, we recognise how hard everyone works at reaching our goals so let’s make life easier and be there and ready to support each other…so who cares who has what title, it's what you do with it that counts!Perks & Opportunities: · Be at the frontline of Visual Analytics and AI· Be involved in landmark projects (E.g. MRT, Construction, Shopping Malls)· Experience working with oversea counterparts· Politics-free & friendly working environment· Generous performance-based bonusWhat are we looking for ?Ownership:You are the master of your tasks, take the charge and play the power button. Don’t wait for someone else to do it for you.Accountability:Drive for accountability and hold each other accountable for work.Creative:Versatile candidates who can apply their skills to a variety of different situations and can solve unexpected problems that come up with ease and confidence.Adaptive and Flexible:Looking for those who are willing to take on new challenges or learn new skills if needed, deal with uncertainty and navigate volatile environments.Job Scope: Design, develop and maintain front end, back end & info model for web application components.Design and develop REST APIs.Implement security and data protection features.Implement testing pipelines from GIT to deployment.Participate in product development, from ideation to deployment.Provide software training and software related support when needed.Skills RequiredProficient in .NET design and development (c#, .NET core), Angular and SQL.Proficient in HTML, CSS, Javascript, TypescriptGood Knowledge and handson developments in Flutter (Preferably) or other frameworks like React Native, Ionic, Apache Cordova.Proficient in writing and executing complex queries in SQL.Knowledge and experience with REST API’s, creating API centric microservices applications, working and connecting with API.Working knowledge of code versioning and code testing.Experienced in using clean code practices, and writing readable, maintainable code.Other skills that would be good to haveExperience with AWS Cloud services like Lambda, EC2, RDS, S3 etc.Experience with Docker/kubernetes and surrounding DevOps tools and related containerization technologies.Knowledge in Python, Node.JS, Redis, MongoDB and other JSON / NoSQL formats.CI/CD and pipeline testing tools.Job Type: Full-timeJob Type: Full-timeSalary: $3,000.00 - Employment Type: Full-Time

PermanentUp to $4,500Kaki BukitMon to Thus: 9am to 6.15pmFri: 9am to 6pm

Convert designs into code
Able to define technical requirements & guidelines for website, applications
Develop responsive websites that are consistent across different web browsers and screen sizes
Design and build reusable modules and libraries for future use
Develop new user-facing features
Practice continuous improvement with regards to the development approach
Able to provide simple directions regarding best user experiences and practices for website and application
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Able to work and meet tight deadlines set by Client’s Business Requirements

Fri: 9am to 6pm

Salary:
Up to $3,000

Location:
Kaki Bukit

Ability to conceptualize and develop visual and interactive concepts
Proficient with website creation/maintenance tools

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Do you believe your designs and code could change the world? If YES, read on!
Mavericks Consulting is a powerhouse of skilled IT professionals who love their craft. We solve complex business problems with simple working solutions by applying Agile software development practices. We provide consultancy advice, develop prototypes for experimentation and validate ideas quickly. We love to write code and build systems that put smiles on our delighted users. We share and have fun together on our continuous learning journey.
Join us and multiply the fun and awesomeness of our workplace!
Your Role and Responsibilities
Adopting Agile and other best practices to create meaningful solutions
Applying scalable design patterns and clean code practices to develop high-quality software that is easily extensible, maintainable and readable
Collaborating with amazing people of different backgrounds and skillsets to solve challenging and complex problems
Actively contributing with your ideas and passion
Being flexible and open to feedback
Adopting a positive learning and growth mindset in all areas of your work
Empathising with stakeholders to develop appropriate, actionable and holistic working solutions
Creating and maintaining a dynamic and inclusive work environment
Genuinely wanting to help change the world
The Qualifications To Be a Maverick
1. Minimum Qualifications
Good understanding of at least one programming language and at least one programming paradigm (OOP, FP)
Experience in writing production-ready code, complete with unit testing and mocking
Worked collaboratively with others to deliver a complete working solution to production
Some experience with clean code practices
Experience in either backend or frontend development (with some working knowledge of the other)
Experience with code versioning tools such as Git
2. Desirable Qualifications
Experience working in cross-functional Agile software engineering teams that used practices like Kanban/Scrum/Lean/XP, Test Driven Development (TDD), Continuous Integration/ Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), etc.
Worked with multiple languages (e.g. Java, Ruby, Python, Scala, GoLang, etc.)
Good understanding of end-to-end application architecture
Experience in other areas of the SDLC (e.g. Testing, Deployment, Requirement Gathering, etc.)
Experience with DevOps practices and Automation tools
Experience working in different development projects of various industries
Experience with developing different applications (e.g. Web, Mobile, Cloud, etc.)
More about the job

Competitive salary package (including bonuses)
Medical and Dental insurance for you and your dependents

Developer
Job Type: Contract/ Full Time
Professional Experience: 1 years
Areas of Study: Computer Science or Equivalent

JOB PURPOSE
Provide solutions to the Global Headquarter office to make their working productivity up by the following tools.
Main scope is to implement / maintain workflow apps developed by Google Spreadsheet and Google App Script for a particular project. Other workflow tools / development can be also in the scope .
PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Understand issues / pain points / requirements through discussion with users
Correctly assess impact
Design application solution / architecture to realize solutions
Develop application which meet client expectation solution and conduct testing
Support User acceptance testing and conduct solution implementation.
Make support documentation for users
Correctly deploy applications
Make documentation for development team
Conduct operational support after deployment

POSITION QUALIFICATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS
1 years software development experience is preferred.
Bachelor degree in computer science or related field
Software development skill by Python , Javascript.
Web Application development skill
Software design skill Developer

Job brief
We are looking for a .NET developer to capable of handling many aspects of the application, including but not limited to performance, scalability, security, and testing.
use .NET to build a highly distributed web application, a sophisticated desktop application, or even a modern mobile application.
Ultimately, work with various IT teams to ensure project deliverable to clients.
Preferred qualifications:
Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC)
5 years of development experience using C# .NET
Knowledge of at least one of the .NET languages (e.g. C#, Visual Basic .NET) and HTML5/CSS3
Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Strong attention to detail
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
Knowledge of REST and RPC APIs
Able to work well in a team setting
Responsibilities
Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages
Remain up to date with the terminology, concepts and best practices for coding mobile apps
Develop technical interfaces, specifications, and architecture
Use and adapt existing web applications for apps
Create and test software prototypes
Develop client displays and user interfaces
Assist software personnel in handling project related work and other requirements
Coordinate with other software professionals and developers Job brief

Job Description:
Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML, CSS practices, Cpanel, FileZilla, XAMPP, PHP, Wordpress, JavaScript, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Photoshop, C++, MySQL or by using current best software development practices
Creating a visually interesting home page and user-friendly design for the website and it will be an advantage if will be able to write the content for the website
Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
Create and maintain software documentation
Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our website
Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities
Cooperate with web designers to match visual design intent
Requirements:
Diploma/Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or any related field
At least have 3 years working experience
Proven working experience in web programming
Top-notch programming skills and in-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS, Cpanel, FileZilla, XAMPP, PHP, Wordpress, JavaScript, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Photoshop, C++, MySQL
Knowledgeable in making videos and 3D is an advantage
A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices
Adequate knowledge of relational database systems, Object Oriented Programming and web application development
Hands-on experience with network diagnostics, network analytics tools
Basic knowledge of Search Engine Optimization process
Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem solving skills
Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen

Designation
Web Application Developer - PHP
Date Listed
11 Jan 2022
Job Type
Experienced / Senior Executive
Full/Perm
Job Period
Immediate Start, Permanent
Profession
IT / Information Technology
Industry
Arts / Entertainment / Recreation
Location Name
Singapore
Allowance / Remuneration
$4,000 - 8,000 monthly
Company Profile
We are hiring for a company that has suite of products includes world-class stock libraries of images, vectors, audio, footage, design elements, templates and editing tools to cater for multiple clientele, geography and partners.

Job Description
Creativity & innovation
Global presence & mindset
Entrepreneurial culture
The Job
Key responsibilities areas:
Assist in software system (software), system architectural design (hardware) and physical and logical database design (database).
Assist the senior and team lead in coding technical solutions and debugging existing and new modules.
Code effectively and take into consideration reusability of codes using object-oriented programming.
Evaluate the system’s actual functionality in relation to expected or intended functionality.
Benchmark code’s performance based on CPU utilization, network utilization, IO utilization, etc and make changes to code.
Participate in research and development of new technologies, concepts and products.
Identify the system’s deficiencies and recommend solutions to address the issues.
Actively propose new ideas, features and functionalities of existing system.
Understand and explore features and functionalities in competitors’ website and propose new ideas system.
Understand technical and functional design requirements based on business flows and processes.
Ideal Candidate
Key competencies:
Possesses at least a Bachelor's Degree from reputable academic institutions, with specialization in IT/Software Development discipline.
Possesses at least 2 years of professional experience in (PHP) web development.
Knowledge of PHP, MySQL, HTML5, JavaScript, Bootstrap and CSS3.
Experience in developing web applications with Laravel/Lumen framework.
Knowledge of ReactJS, Elasticsearch, NodeJS & AWS will be an added advantage.
Possesses strong technical and analytical knowledge in web development.
Possesses good command of English, a positive work attitude and the ability to work collaboratively across all levels.
Able to work well under pressure and accepts criticism positively.
Pleasant disposition, and possesses a good interpersonal skill.
Ref: VAG2NUMARJ
Application Instructions
Apply to this role at https://snaphunt.com/jobs/VAG2NUMARJ

About Atome

Atome is a leading buy now pay later brand in Asia offering consumers choice, convenience and flexibility in how they choose to shop and pay, with zero-interest payments over time.

We partner over 5,000 online and offline retailers in nine markets (Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Vietnam, Philippines, Thailand and mainland China).

Atome, pronounced as "A-Toe-Me', stands for "Available to Me". We enable consumers' deepest passions by making products and services more accessible, affordable, and available to them-via customisable features and a smarter shopping experience.

As part of the Advance Intelligence Group, an Al-driven technology company with over 1500+ employees in 12 markets worldwide, we are united by a shared vision and purpose: to Advance with Intelligence for a Better Life-for our customers, colleagues and communities.

Our culture is built on values that are core to who we are and what we stand for:

We foster an INNOVATION mindset
We achieve results with EFFICIENCY and excellence
We take pride in the QUALITY of our work
We uphold INTEGRITY in all we do
We embrace COLLABORATION to work across business lines and borders

Job Responsibilities:

Work closely with product managers, back-end developers, QA team and data team to build robust websites in mobile and desktop platforms.
Optimize code quality and fine-tune layouts/effect quality to provide smooth user experience.
Develop reusable, testable and well-structured code using the latest front-end technologies.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues/bugs with existing codes.
Cooperate with web infrastructure team and devops team to build libraries/services to enhance team efficiency.

Job Requirements:

You are qualified to have:

Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or any relevant field.
Solid understanding of HTML/ES6/Typescript/CSS.
Good understanding of computer networks, basic data structures.
Familiarity of React/Vue frameworks.
Good communication skills.


You will be prominent if you have:

Good understanding of basic algorithms.
Knowledge of back-end development and devops related topics.
Understanding of details in build process.
Multi-lingual due to regional coverage.

Company Profile
Our client is a venture capitalist that supports ambitious and impactful startups across the globe.
Job Description
Be a key player in the growth of a disruptive Ed tech startup
Work alongside & learn from best in class talent
Strong opportunities to progress your career
The Job
You will report to the Senior Product Marketing Manager and collaborate with internal B2C marketing, design and product team members
You will build, maintain and improve corporate public websites and marketing landing pages with mix of drag & drop and CSS
You will be responsible for website content management that features best in class web UX, usabilities, responsiveness, localisation and automation
You will ensure high quality implementation based on designs, wireframes and prototypes through coding with version control
You will take charge of optimisation of all web properties, including SEO, site speeds, mobile friendliness and code audits etc
You will take ownership of setting up, reporting and analysing website tracking and performance through quantitative and qualitative methods
You will communicate with backend engineers on API integrations and hosting providers on website server functionality and efficiency
You will manage web-related projects that involve internal and external parties and vendors
The Profile
You have at least 2 years of experience as a Web Designer and Frontend Developer
You have hands on experience in WordPress and SEO and are proficient in PHP, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Git, NGINX etc.
You have a strong knowledge of design in web UX, photo editing and video creation. You also have experience designing landing pages efficiently
You have a very good understanding of SEO, web analytics and web optimisation with best practices
You have experience in managing projects and are capable of launching and managing web projects
Experience with digital marketing and Conversion Rate Optimisation is a plus

Company Profile
Our client is a venture capitalist that supports ambitious and impactful startups across the globe.
Job Description
Be a key player in the growth of a disruptive Ed tech startup
Work alongside & learn from best in class talent
Strong opportunities to progress your career
The Job
You will report to the Senior Product Marketing Manager and collaborate with internal B2C marketing, design and product team members
You will build, maintain and improve corporate public websites and marketing landing pages with mix of drag & drop and CSS
You will be responsible for website content management that features best in class web UX, usabilities, responsiveness, localisation and automation
You will ensure high quality implementation based on designs, wireframes and prototypes through coding with version control
You will take charge of optimisation of all web properties, including SEO, site speeds, mobile friendliness and code audits etc
You will take ownership of setting up, reporting and analysing website tracking and performance through quantitative and qualitative methods
You will communicate with backend engineers on API integrations and hosting providers on website server functionality and efficiency
You will manage web-related projects that involve internal and external parties and vendors
The Profile
You have at least 2 years of experience as a Web Designer and Frontend Developer
You have hands on experience in WordPress and SEO and are proficient in PHP, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Git, NGINX etc.
You have a strong knowledge of design in web UX, photo editing and video creation. You also have experience designing landing pages efficiently
You have a very good understanding of SEO, web analytics and web optimisation with best practices
You have experience in managing projects and are capable of launching and managing web projects
Experience with digital marketing and Conversion Rate Optimisation is a plus
Ref: LVK6XUHKI2
Application Instructions
Apply to this role at https://snaphunt.com/jobs/LVK6XUHKI2

Frontend Web Developer

Location Name
Ubi Road 1, Oxley BizHub, Singapore
Address
61 Ubi Rd 1, Singapore 408732
Map
Allowance / Remuneration
$2,000 - 5,000 monthly
Company Profile
Akin is positioned at the intersection of data, creative design and contemporary culture, our unique approach to marketing delivers real business impact.
Job Description
An agency in its typical sense will have various teams – the planning, strategy and accounts team. As an agency, our developers will be expected to support these roles. As a web developer, you will be involved end-to-end from the planning process through project implementation and release.
 As a developer, you will need to be confident of your builds and how to approach development products. Business impact through integrated demand and lead generation is a big aspect of our work, so while you need to understand the mechanics and stay on top of it, you should also understand that a piece of strategic advice goes much further. In our agency, we believe in being agnostic of platforms or approaches e.g. you are comfortable in applying the principles of product management, innovation and digital transformation across different script, languages or technological platforms to achieve business goals. You’ll need to understand the client’s business and infrastructure, and at least be conversant in all aspects of a technology methodology which enables revenue generation or cost reduction. In our company, this will fall across our business pillars of insights, brand, marketing and technology. This will allow us to stay agile, sensible and rigorous in our recommendations.
In essence, you will be required to be experienced in all aspects of what commonly feeds towards strategy in a larger agency. You will need to be in charge of front-end development, working with project managers and account managers towards the success of the project. As you progress, you may be more knowledgeable or inclined towards one domain, but you should grasp the importance of others, and be able to understand and give advice on how it influences the outcomes you’re looking for. Within this, you’ll also be expected to understand how your work impacts the other departments.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities: (other duties may be assigned)
Develop, test, deploy, and maintain high quality websites and applications according to specifications and requirements
Collaborate with designers, marketing and business reps to validate site features, feasibility, and effort estimation; propose technical solutions based on solid understanding of best practices
Design and develop content-related web pages for lead generation
Develop, test and deploy dynamic web-based solutions
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Provides research-backed recommendations for new approaches for software development technology
Participates in all SDLC phases including architecture specifications and design; website configuration; database design; programming; quality assurance; testing and implementation; and ongoing maintenance and support
Develops and adheres to development standards that allows for the maintainability of code; build reusable code and libraries for future use
Continuously evaluates the design and functionality of supported websites and applications, and makes thoughtful and significant recommendations for improvements
Analyzes performance of websites and takes action to correct deficiencies
Participates in the modification and architecture of websites to resolve issues and plan for future growth
Troubleshoot bugs and manage QA feedback; maintain new and existing web-based applications
Communicate regularly on status and progress of active projects
Work with remote development team to develop websites
Participates in the development and implementation of internal business initiatives that improve efficiency and enhance productivity
Requirements:
Minimum 3 – 5 years of working experience in web application and development
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery
Proven PHP development experience and knowledge
Experience with CMS platforms like WordPress
Functional knowledge of relational databases (MySQL)
Knowledge and experience in the following are an advantage:
Experience with ecommerce template like WooCommerce, Magento
Experience with server provisioning and deployment of WordPress sites
Knowledge in integration using API to other applications
Excellent responsive web design skills using CSS and HTML, and able to quickly prototype web page layouts
Strong experience using Adobe products for creating/editing graphics and website artifacts (Dreamweaver, Fireworks or Photoshop); HTML slicing
Strong object-oriented programming skills with C# and JavaScript
Advanced experience with client side technologies such as JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, DHTML and others
Experience with AJAX, JSON, XML, DOM, and XSLT
Experience with cross browser and cross platform compatibility issues (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari, Chrome, PC, Mac, tablets, smart phones, etc.)
Good understanding of version control (GIT, SVN)
Experience applying best practices including effective error handling
Excellent written and verbal communication skills; ability to work well with both technical and non-technical team members
Strong analytical skills a must
Ability to manage multiple concurrent projects, adjusting priority as necessary, and consistently meet deadlines
Enjoys solving problems and providing the best possible solutions
Enjoys designing and developing modern-looking and highly effective web pages and content
Enjoys staying current with new technology
JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Web Programming Skills, E-Commerce, Teamwork, Verbal Communication, cross-browser compatibility, Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API’s
Application Instructions
You will have a higher chance of consideration by applying for this position following the link here:


https://talenttribe.asia/jobs/akin/frontend-web-developer-KydreH

Collaborate with designers, marketing and business reps to validate site features, feasibility, and effort estimation; propose technical solutions based on solid understanding of best practices
Design and develop content-related web pages for lead generation
Develop, test and deploy dynamic web-based solutions
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Provides research-backed recommendations for new approaches for software development technology
Participates in all SDLC phases including architecture specifications and design; website configuration; database design; programming; quality assurance; testing and implementation; and ongoing maintenance and support
Develops and adheres to development standards that allows for the maintainability of code; build reusable code and libraries for future use
Continuously evaluates the design and functionality of supported websites and applications, and makes thoughtful and significant recommendations for improvements
Analyzes performance of websites and takes action to correct deficiencies
Participates in the modification and architecture of websites to resolve issues and plan for future growth
Troubleshoot bugs and manage QA feedback; maintain new and existing web-based applications
Communicate regularly on status and progress of active projects
Work with remote development team to develop websites
Participates in the development and implementation of internal business initiatives that improve efficiency and enhance productivity
Requirements:
Minimum 3 – 5 years of working experience in web application and development
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery
Proven PHP development experience and knowledge
Experience with CMS platforms like WordPress
Functional knowledge of relational databases (MySQL)
Knowledge and experience in the following are an advantage:
Experience with ecommerce template like WooCommerce, Magento
Experience with server provisioning and deployment of WordPress sites
Knowledge in integration using API to other applications
Excellent responsive web design skills using CSS and HTML, and able to quickly prototype web page layouts
Strong experience using Adobe products for creating/editing graphics and website artifacts (Dreamweaver, Fireworks or Photoshop); HTML slicing
Strong object-oriented programming skills with C# and JavaScript
Advanced experience with client side technologies such as JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, DHTML and others
Experience with AJAX, JSON, XML, DOM, and XSLT
Experience with cross browser and cross platform compatibility issues (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari, Chrome, PC, Mac, tablets, smart phones, etc.)
Good understanding of version control (GIT, SVN)
Experience applying best practices including effective error handling
Excellent written and verbal communication skills; ability to work well with both technical and non-technical team members
Strong analytical skills a must
Ability to manage multiple concurrent projects, adjusting priority as necessary, and consistently meet deadlines
Enjoys solving problems and providing the best possible solutions
Enjoys designing and developing modern-looking and highly effective web pages and content
Enjoys staying current with new technology
JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Web Programming Skills, E-Commerce, Teamwork, Verbal Communication, cross-browser compatibility, Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API’s

Java developer
Key Responsibilities
Hands-on Java server-side coding to build a real-time E-Trading system
Full-stack development. Mostly server side coding using the Spring framework with some front-end web development in ReactJS.
Peer code review
Writing automated tests

Knowledge of ReactJS or another popular JS framework.
Experience with relational databases, especially Oracle.
Comfortable using Maven, Git and Bitbucket.

Vista Musical Instruments is an innovative, global collective of music-related brands dedicated to building meaningful products and experiences for the music community. Brands include MONO, Teisco, Harmony, Heritage Guitars and Swee Lee. Vista Musical Instruments is headquartered in Singapore, with operations in USA, UK and APAC, and is a division of Caldecott Music Group.
We are looking for a passionate Frontend Web Developer to join our E-Commerce team in Singapore.
The web developer has experience building tailored Shopify frontend applications and will be participating in the development of e-commerce sites and web services working with both Shopify APIs and internal applications.
Reporting to the Web Development Lead, this role will work closely with product managers, developers, designers and marketers to produce outstanding customer experiences while developing and maintaining high-traffic e-commerce and media sites visited worldwide.

Responsibilities
Develop and maintain, and integrate our e-commerce ecosystems.
Contribute to monitoring and optimise applications performance, stability and security.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues with existing codes.
Utilise web services to integrate with 3rd party applications.
Build internal tools based on third-party applications and APIs.
Keep the platforms, workflows and documentation up-to-date.

Requirements
At least 3 years building frontend applications.
At least 2 years of experience with Shopify.
At least 2 years of experience with React.
Experiences building node.js applications.
Experiences with GraphQL.
Strong knowledge and skills with HTML, Javascript, CSS.
Strong knowledge of working with code builders, optimisers and tasks runners.
Very good knowledge of Git.
Good at working collaboratively with other developers.
Experience with automated software deployments and continuous delivery.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Understanding of microservices architectures is a plus.
Understanding of Serverless Architecture is a plus.
Understanding of AWS Lambda is a plus. Role summary:
Olea is looking for a quality engineer with aspirations of having business impact by ensure quality of software delivery in an agile delivery environment. Candidate will take part in development of quality standard, execution and enforcement of quality delivery practices in our product delivery.
You will have the opportunity to work with product built on latest technologies like microservices deployed in cloud environment, data analytics, machine learning and blockchain.
You will work with a dynamic team and guided by highly experienced and hands-on senior members and management of the technology team including our Chief Architect and CTO, allowing you to grow in technical skills and in adopting mature agile delivery practices. You will have opportunity for close interaction with our digital solution and business operation team to gain domain knowledge and experience in Trade Finance domain.

Responsibilities:
Assist in creation and review of quality policies, standards and practices.
Be proactive in communicating with Production Owner to understanding business requirements and user stories to develop the test strategy, test plan and test cases to ensure delivery quality.
Execute manual and automated testing to ensure quality of product feature developed.
Collaborate with development team closely to follow up on test incidents to ensure development team perform proper root cause analysis, fix and closure.
Assist project manager and tech operation team in monitoring of quality issues in incidents and problems.
Proactively identify and implement quality improvement measures, and exploration of tools and practices that can improve the efficiency and effectiveness of product delivery.
Guide junior engineers to deliver.
Support the agile practices and building of agile culture within the organisation.
Candidates that are willing to perform beyond the normal duty and take on responsibility to ensure success of Olea product delivery are preferred.

Role specific technical competencies:
Candidate should possess experience in both manual testing and automated testing of web application, API and interfaces.
Candidate should have experience with test automation tools (e.g. Selenium, Cucumber).
Candidate with both functional and non-functional testing experience (e.g. performance testing, security testing) are preferred.
Candidate should have strong understanding of application design and software development practices.
Candidate should have good understanding in agile delivery. Strong agile delivery experience is advantageous.
Candidate should have the experience or knowledge in quality policies, standard and practices.
Candidate should have strong communication and collaboration skills in an agile delivery environment.

Qualifications (training, licences, memberships and certifications):
Bachelors in Computer science or similar degree

Note:
Olea is committed to diversity and inclusion. By providing equal opportunities we foster a work environment which embraces diversity and gets the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain business performance and competitive advantage. We build an inclusive culture by demonstrating respect for each other’s unique strengths and perspectives to enable every employee to develop a sense of belonging and have the opportunity to maximise their potential. Working Location: Tai Seng
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 9.30 am – 7 pm
Salary Package: Up to $6,500 + Bonus + Allowances
Duration: Permanent Role
Key Responsibilities
Analyse requirements and develop, maintain and enhance custom developed application software and scripts to meet the requirements.
Develop application software or scripts as and when required.

Candidates with more experience will be considered for senior positions
Good programming and analytical skills.
Good written and oral communication skills.
Experience in scripting languages such as JAVA, XML, JSP
Good knowledge of Microsoft.NET Framework.
Good understanding of Web Services API

Submit your application by clicking the APPLY button;
Email your resume to Job(at)anradus.com.sg . Please indicate #43393 on the email subject.

Assist and/or represent the Company in the technical aspects of your software development.
Conduct code review and testing.
Prepare documentation e.g. Design specifications, User Acceptance Test documents,s and participate in reviews.
Software design and optimization.
Installation of the completed project on the Company’s Hosting Servers or Client’s Hosting Environment
Develop custom-built applications using .Net Framework, ASP Framework, Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 and 2008 Development Environment, Microsoft SQL Database Server Platform, and Oracle Database server platform.
APPLY NOW!!
Min 2 years of experience in development using .NET/ASP
Candidates with more experience will be considered for senior positions
Good programming and analytical skills.
Good written and oral communication skills.
Experience in scripting languages such as JAVA, XML, JSP
Good knowledge of Microsoft.NET Framework.
Good understanding of Web Services API
Please apply through ANY of the following methods:
Submit your application by clicking the APPLY button;
Email your resume to Job(at)anradus.com.sg . Please indicate #43393 on the email subject.
Anradus Policy: This clarifies Anradus' working procedures, from receiving the applicant's resume, screening to shortlisting. We assure you our consultants will go through every resume we receive but we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_title: Web Programmer / Developer (Web API, ASP.net, Full stack developer)

Key Responsibilities
Work with Product team to develop and support Makino Asia Digital/Software Products
Design & Develop Rich User Interface Web Applications using Angular Bootstrap, SQL Server technologies
Develop applications using MVC framework and communicating with web API
Working closely with web designers and programmers to produce the website
Constant communication with other colleagues in the business to develop and deploy content – and ensuring there is a clear establishment of what can be created within what timeframe
Delivering a complete UX solution ensuring high performance on Web applications
Well Versed in application development using agile methodology
Researching different software programs, maintaining software documentation
Qualifications
Degree in Electrical / Electronics / Software Engineering.
Minimum 1-2 years of related experience
Some experience with JavaScript and HTML5
Skilled in .Net, C#, Angular, OOPS and ASP
Understanding of SOILD principle, Design Patterns, Architecture Pattern [MVC, MVVM], Architecture Style [REST, SOA], TDD, OOAD, Agile methodologies.
Validating user actions on the client side and providing responsive feedback
Good to have knowledge about tools like TFS, Jira, GIT, Azure
Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas
Good communication and team player

About Perx:

Perx Technologies is a category-creating Lifestyle Marketing SaaS Platform helping large enterprises and digital native businesses transform from transient and transactional brands to delivering continuous and meaningful customer engagements in the digital economy. Powering large regional and global brands, the platform enables organizations of all sizes to monetize customer engagements by creating personalized, interactive revenue-generating digital experiences for millions of end consumers.

Quick Snapshot:

The Web Designer/Developer is a skilled and experienced designer/developer responsible for creating, improving, and maintaining the website for our company. He/ She is working alongside the marketing team to add content to the website efficiently and effectively, given a definitive set of requirements specifications, and constraints.

What’s the role?
Design, conceptualize, develop, maintain and improve our current mobile-first LMP website based on the latest web trends, tools, requirements, and specifications.
Manage and troubleshoot integrations to our website, CRM, email automation tools, like but not limited to Zapier, Drift, Upscale and Sendinblue.
Identify and resolve problems uncovered by feedback and testings related to the website.
Strong in UX/UI principles while building interactivity on Mobile, Web, and PWA
Good creative inclination in converting project requirements to initial drafts and final output
Showcase strong design principles based on mobile-first design
Deliver animation beyond just GIFs to demonstrate simple concepts on our website
Work with the marketing director to bring web and design ideas from scratch to life
Collaborate with the digital marketing specialist to take the necessary steps to enable user journey tracking on our website as well as all other microsite and campaign landing pages for Perx B2B customers
Work with peer web developers and UX designers on the same project and piece together the final output
Who are we looking for?
A people person and a great team player
Someone with great work ethics in the form of work discipline and going the extra mile when needed
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related subject OR equivalent work experience.
Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications
Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Ability to create and add animation in CSS, SVG, JS, and/or GIF.
The ability to create and edit a video is a bonus plus.
Has experience working with WordPress CMS, Zapier, Freshsales CRM, Sendinblue, to name a few.
Ability to communicate the design and implementation of applications including relevant strengths/weaknesses and reasons for implementation decisions
Adaptable and able to pick up new techniques and skills
Ability to keep up to date with advances in design and web development trends and tools.
Proven experience in solving challenging technical problems.
What’s on offer?
Collaborative environment and the opportunity to work with one of Asia’s leading players in the Martech and Fintech space.
Opportunity to work with > 1Bn B2C global conglomerates in the banking, large retail, insurance and telecom sectors.
Work with a globally hand-picked talent of 50+ people strong, with almost two dozen different nationalities working together with the same goal and vision in mind.
Work with largest brands in the region who leverage the SaaS platform to engage 50Mn+ consumers each day.
Great career development opportunities across marketing, pre-sales and customer engagement teams offered with cross developmental training.

We understand that product innovation comes from people innovation and that is why we invest in high potentials and cultivating leaders throughout the organization. If you are passionate about creating and contributing to a top-notch culture – join us. This is your opportunity to be part of an incredible story that is only getting bigger and more exciting by the day. We are passionately disrupting the traditional loyalty space and redefining what it means for brands to have meaningful relationships with their customers in the mobile-first economy. About Perx:

Riverr is a fast growing Med Tech startup based in Singapore. We develop solutions that help stakeholders understand, process, store and use their medical data to its full potential. We offer extensible in-house solutions that help the stakeholders grow their business based on their data and help patients with their healthcare with preventive health data analysis.We are currently looking for a Frontend Developer focused on UX and design to join our team.Job Description: Your job will be to provide UI designs that consider UX and be able to implement the designs yourself in our applications. You will work closely with our co-founder & CTO to re-think our current products design and help with the conceptualization and designing of our future products. You will have to be good at UI design, considering UX, developing with HTML and CSS to fully carry out your responsibilities. However if you are weak at one of them our team can always helpQualifications required: Requirements of the position include English language fluency and relevant skills. We are looking for a passionate individual who has the following:Prior experience with CSS, HTML, UX, UI Design and React JSA flare for illustrating and conceptualising visualsHas a pragmatic, mature approach: applying adequate solutions to real problemsIs able to take honest productive feedbackFeels comfortable working on their own without needing feedback every step of the wayFeels comfortable taking proactive initiatives and also give feedback to colleaguesMust have minimum 3 years experience with:UX / UI designIllustratingCSSHTMLWorking at RiverrRiverr is based out of Singapore. We have an office in Singapore where some of us choose to work out, however we are a remote-first company. Everyone has the option to choose where and how they work, to us location is not important.We are currently a team of 14, in which 7 of us are developers. We are made up of 5 different nationalities; diversity and open-mindedness are a big part of our culture. Even though we are from different nationalities and located in different countries we put an extra effort in making sure we all get to meet each other physically.Job Types: Full-time, PermanentSalary: $4,500.00 - $8,000.00 per monthBenefits:Flexible scheduleWork from homeSchedule:Day shiftMonday to FridaySupplemental Pay:Performance bonus Riverr is a fast growing Med Tech startup based in Singapore. We are seeking for highly motivated and passionate software developers to join and build agile and user-centric software products. The software developer will be able to translate concepts from Product Owners into production quality products. He/She/They will be working closely with team members of different disciplines and have influence to deliver quality software programs.

Requirements:
Tertiary qualification in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering, or related fields
Familiar with database technologies (SQL Server)
Experience in cloud service
Experience in Inventory Management System, WMS and SAP is at an advantage
Experience in Web Based application development is a must
Clean code capability (be able to solve problem in given time with clean code)
Good knowledge of agile processes, continuous integration/continuous development and cloud technologies will be an advantage
Technology focused, self-motivated and proactive in problem solving
Organized, Self-motivated, enthusiastic and proven rapid learning capability
Skillsets:
The technical skillsets required are as follows:
Angular(V2 & above), HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Entity Framework
C# .NET Core, .NET Framework
Understands database structures and knowledge of database languages, MS SQL
RESTful Web API
The good to have technical skillsets are as follows:
Work with Tracking devices such as BLE, RFID reader/devices
Responsibilities:
Understand system requirements, workflow, and functions from the project manager/team lead
Propose relevant software solutions
Design and develop software systems
Write high quality, efficient and clean codes with good practices
Perform software unit and integration testing
Deploy software system
Maintain existing software, resolve issues and implement change requests
Adhere to proper technical documentations
Ensure high-quality system as a whole
Remuneration will be based on experience. We are seeking for highly motivated and passionate software developers to join and build agile and user-centric software products. Job Description
The Web Designer will work closely with Marketing and Content Team at all stages of the client service cycle to develop stunning creative collateral for our local and international clients.
Apply user experience and design principles in the execution of high-quality mock-ups and workflows
Create visually appealing website mockups, ads, infographics, ebooks, email newsletters and other various creative outputs required from the design team
Execute designs, showing a high-level taste and understanding of design aesthetics, while remaining true to the client’s branding
Create mockups with the understanding that HTML/CSS issues may hinder some design freedom
Customize WordPress themes, plugins and widgets for use on client’s sites
QUALIFICATIONS:
Degree or equivalent professional experience in web design and user experience
1-4 years of professional experience
Expert in Adobe Creative Suite
Knowledge in the use of CMS (WordPress) and Front-End development Tools
Expert knowledge in user experience principles, web/mobile standards Job Description
