IntroductionAutomata Network (https://ata.network) is a decentralized service protocol that provides privacy middlewares for dApps on Ethereum and Polkadot to achieve privacy, high assurance and frictionless computation. Leveraging on the latest crypto and privacy-protection algorithms, along with hardware-based trust, the service protocol enables versatile use-cases not previously possible in the past, such as anonymous voting, MEV minimization, and no-tracking indexing.It is built by the industry’s foremost blockchain veterans and award-winning researchers, who previously worked at Zilliqa, LongHash, and the National University of Singapore. Founded in 2019, Automata Network is a recipient of Web3 Grant (2020), and a participant of the Web 3.0 Bootcamp (2020), Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator (2021), Polkadot Decoded Mainstage speaker (2021). It has raised $3.4 million in total funding in early 2021.We are looking for self-driven and experienced solidity developers who build Dapps and smart contracts with a product mindset. You are expected to work closely with the core team members and deliver secure and robust smart contracts running on any compatible EVM platforms. Some full-stack development is also required to build user-friendly interfaces. We are based in Singapore but remote working is also acceptable.ResponsibilitiesDevelop secure and robust smart contracts on Ethereum and other platforms.Work with frontend developers to create full-fledged decentralized applicationsCollaborate with other team members to plan projectsPerform design reviews and code reviews regularlyCreate technical specifications and documentationQualificationsOver 2 years of experience in smart contract and Dapp developmentExperience of smart contract development framework such as Hardhat, Truffle or Brownie.Working experience with Typescript, Node.js.Experience in web development frameworks.Familiarity with open-source development and collaborationsStrong problem-solving and communication skillsPerksGreat career development opportunities in a growing companyCompetitive compensation with crypto incentivesFlexible working hours and casual work attireJob Types: Full-time, PermanentSalary: $5,000.00 - $12,000.00 per monthSchedule:Flexible hoursMonday to FridayExperience:Solidity: 1 year (Preferred) IntroductionAutomata Network (https://ata.network) is a decentralized service protocol that provides privacy middlewares for dApps on Ethereum and Polkadot to achieve privacy, high assurance and frictionless computation. Here at Fragcolor we love games, and we believe in the freedom and creativity that decentralization and blockchain technology can bring to gaming. Fragcolor is the primary developer behind the Fragnova Network, a decentralized gaming ecosystem to power The Open Metaverse. We are building a revolutionary new decentralized game engine and other tools to allow content creators and game developers to create, publish, and monetize their game assets and even games themselves as NFTs, moving away from the walled garden model.

Fragcolor is a global, fast-moving and dynamic start-up environment. We all love games and believe in the power that blockchain technology can bring to space. We have a work hard, play hard culture where people have the freedom to be creative and drive global impact. Our mission to power the open metaverse will revolutionize the gaming space. If you believe in this mission as well, please join us!
Read our article for more details.

Link: https://medium.com/@fragnova/fragnova-network-create-play-connect-17592186b435

The Job

Develop and maintain our websites, web based systems.

Requirements

Essentials:
3+ years of experience in web development, preferably in the gaming industry.
Experience in Typescript, Vue.js, Nuxt, React; otherwise experience in other frontend technologies with a willingness to learn.
Experience in PHP, Symfony, Java, Python; otherwise experience in other backend technologies with a willingness to learn.
Experience with devOps technologies such as Docker, AWS.
Experience with at least one relational or non-relational database.
Experience with at least one web server such as Nginx, Apache, Caddy.
Experience with git and GitHub.
Ability to write and communicate effectively in English.
Ability and/or experience working remotely as a part of a distributed team.
Ability to work proactively with minimal supervision.
Eagerness to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team.
Nice to have:
Experience in developing and launching a website/web-based system from scratch.
Experience with multi platform app development.
Familiarity with major blockchain technologies and technical developments in the ecosystem. Familiarity with major blockchain technologies and technical developments in the ecosystem. Show more

Roles & Responsibilities

Common
Add value to the team and the business, through personal ownership and partnerships with everyone else in the organization.
System Operation
Responsible to handle service requests, system support, troubleshooting,and user inquiry.

Clarify customers' requests and prioritize the tasks
Conduct user training and create training manuals for power users

Clarify software tasks by analysing requirements and understanding complex activation system features and functionality.

REQUIREMENTS:
Degree in Information Technology or equivalent.
Proficient in both spoken and written English.
4-5 years of Java and Web application development.
WEB programming skills of Java, J2EE, Angular, Spring-boot, Spring JPA, Hibernate, and MS SQL.
Experience with web services standards and related technologies (XML, JSON, REST, SOAP, WSDL).
Experience in public cloud development or relevant certification holder (optional but good to have).
Strong foundation in requirement elicitation and data structure.
Experience in coding standards and follow the best practices to maintain code quality.
Strong customer service focus and sense of urgency.
Ability to work well in a team environment.
Ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies and systems.
Good in problem-solving, logical thinking, and coding’s best practice.
Communication skills to communicate quickly and accurately with technicians and business stakeholders
Proactively establish and maintain effective working team relationships with all support departments
Ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies and systems
Strong organization, planning, and prioritization skills
Project/Product Management or scrum master experience for the web system preferred

Ginza Xiaoma is Asia’s leading Hermès curator, collector, and reseller. We are one of Asia’s most prestigious Hermès boutiques with our flagship store located in the heart of Ginza, Tokyo. As Japan’s #1 largest Hermes’s specialty store, we have a rare collection of more than 400 items and handle over 4,000 Hermes bags, apparel, accessories and other rare collector items.We have just expanded our business to Singapore and we are looking for for a self-motivated and high performing Intern to join our new team in Singapore. You will thrive in this position if you are goals-driven, strategic and tactical and have a growth mindset. Working with the global team in Singapore and marketing team in Japan, this is a precious chance to gain international exposure and develop essential interpersonal skills in a global luxury brand.We are looking for a technically gifted and ambitious Full Stack Web Developer intern to join our Singapore team to support our website (www.ginzaxiaoma.com) and deliver our customers world-class user experience. Ideally, you're someone who can hustle and is willing to learn. You'll be treated just like any of your senior developers, and given the autonomy to work on new features for the website.Job Responsibilities: Write well-designed, clean, testable code and ensure the program runs properlyBuild new user-facing features while maintaining old onesProficiency in JavaScript with a knack for getting the visuals rightQuality checks on desktop vs mobile sites, for both design and contentMake sure web pages are optimized for best speed and scalabilityBuild responsive, mobile-first web application to support our rapid growthTroubleshoot and debugJob Requirements: Front-end web development knowledge - Proficient in HTML/CSS/JavaScript (Vue)Proficient UI/UX design and translate UI design into codeUnderstand server-side CSSBackend - Java, MySQL, Redis knowledge is a bonusAWS (EC2) Cloud knowledge is a bonusQualifications: This position is open to students who are currently studying in Polytechnics or Universities ideally pursuing a Diploma/B.S (expected graduation date between 2022 to 2025) in Computer Science or graduated from a related technical field like Software Engineering, Information Technology or related fieldsIf you're not a student or studying in a related field but have the knowledge and skill in this role, feel free to apply.Priority will be given to applicants who can commit long-termBenefits: Competitive salaryComputer equipment: Macbook or Windows of your chociceHands-on opportunity to learn and grow new skills in a fast-paced environmentPrestigious high-end luxury marketKnowledge of Hermès products acquired after this internship will be valuable for your portfolioProspect of hiring after graduation for performersTeam lunches/dinners and eventsContact and interact with big celebrity guests and top fashion bloggers around the worldPerformance bonusPlease send your resume to leon at ginzaxiaoma.com. We are looking for to hire a Front End developer to join our digital product team.

Working Location: One North

ShipsFocus Group
Job Description
ShipsFocus is world’s first and foremost maritime venture studio. We are at the forefront of maritime technology, creating startups and solutions that solve real problems for the trillion-dollar industry. We are committed to an employee-oriented, high performance culture that emphasizes empowerment, quality, and the recruitment and on-going development of a superior workforce.
This is a unique opportunity to experience at the intersections of venture investment, startup ecosystem, and disruptive maritime technologies. You can expect direct involvement with and mentoring from our seniors. If you are looking to enter the maritime industry or be an aspiring entrepreneur, get right into the action!
The Role:
As our Web Designer, you will be working closely with the business (product owner) and frontend developer(s) to create refreshingly professional and user-friendly web & mobile user interfaces. As a startup, the nature of our work will be fast-paced and you will be given multiple tasks simultaneously – prioritizing tasks & time management is important. You constantly challenge yourself to collaborate better with the team, explore new possibilities for better product quality, and succeed with the team.
Job Responsibilities:
Manage and upgrade existing WordPress websites
Design and create new icons, logos, banners, brochures, videos, instruction manuals and presentation materials for our products (software & services)
Mockups for web applications and mobile apps (product owner will provide rough sketch and explanation of the functions and features)
Job Requirement
Specific Skills Required:
Proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
Proficient in WordPress (Experience with Elementor is a plus)
Proficient in MS Power Point (especially with animations)
Experience in Web Hosting using e.g. Wix, Bluehost
Strong communicative skills
Tremendously positive attitude
Good listening & creative problem-solving skills
Eager to learn and able to grasp concepts fast
More Information

HZU9IOFSKB7R7QK0SY85

Job Description
ShipsFocus is world’s first and foremost maritime venture studio. We are at the forefront of maritime technology, creating startups and solutions that solve real problems for the trillion-dollar industry. We are committed to an employee-oriented, high performance culture that emphasizes empowerment, quality, and the recruitment and on-going development of a superior workforce.
This is a unique opportunity to experience at the intersections of venture investment, startup ecosystem, and disruptive maritime technologies. You can expect direct involvement with and mentoring from our seniors. If you are looking to enter the maritime industry or be an aspiring entrepreneur, get right into the action!
The Role:
As our Web Designer, you will be working closely with the business (product owner) and frontend developer(s) to create refreshingly professional and user-friendly web & mobile user interfaces. As a startup, the nature of our work will be fast-paced and you will be given multiple tasks simultaneously – prioritizing tasks & time management is important. You constantly challenge yourself to collaborate better with the team, explore new possibilities for better product quality, and succeed with the team.
Job Responsibilities:
Manage and upgrade existing WordPress websites
Design and create new icons, logos, banners, brochures, videos, instruction manuals and presentation materials for our products (software & services)
Mockups for web applications and mobile apps (product owner will provide rough sketch and explanation of the functions and features)
Job Requirement
Specific Skills Required:
Proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
Proficient in WordPress (Experience with Elementor is a plus)
Proficient in MS Power Point (especially with animations)
Experience in Web Hosting using e.g. Wix, Bluehost
Strong communicative skills
Tremendously positive attitude
Good listening & creative problem-solving skills
Eager to learn and able to grasp concepts fast

Company Profile
Affyn is a Singapore-based company building a blockchain-powered Metaverse project with a Free to Play, Play-to-Earn mobile game.
What makes Affyn Unique?
Play-to-Earn that is Free-to-Play A Play-to-Earn Metaverse that allows players to start playing and earning without any initial fee.
Sustainable Game Economy To ensure the rewards remain attractive to existing and new players in the long run, Affyn found the solution to maintain a sustainable and growing game economy.
Mobile Geolocation-Based Mobile geolocation-based gaming is on the rise, and Affyn will become the pioneer of the mobile Play-to-Earn category in the blockchain space.
Real World Token Utility Users who earn FYN do not have to convert into FIAT currency to use in the real world. Affyn provides special privileges and benefits when they pay in FYN.
https://www.affyn.com/
Job Description
Are you curious about buzzwords like Metaverse, Blockchain, De-Fi, NFT, Smart Contracts, etc.? At Affyn, you will find yourself becoming part of the early movement into this space. About Us
Affyn may be a startup from Singapore but our fanbase and investors are global. We are building a blockchain-powered Metaverse project with a Free-to-Play, Play-to-Earn mobile game with integrated geolocation where the virtual and real world converge. We also incorporate the fun element of gaming with blockchain technology such as the utility of NFTs. We want to build the community in Metaverse together, bring Metaverse and NFT to the mainstream.
We are looking for like-minded talent who are keen to join us as Web Developer. You are someone who:
• has an insatiable thirst for growth and learning, • want to build and grow together with usexperienced and completed the front-end architecture designknows the ins and outs of web developmentunderstand optimization and how to constantly improve the front-end architecture
What you'll need:2 to 5 years experience in front-end development, fresh graduates are welcomeProficient in HTML / CSS / Javascript, familiar with ES6/Typescript (pls check if we are using ES6)
• Proficient in React Framework. • Proficient in using but not reliant on mainstream front-end libraries. • Any experience with blockchain and web3.js is a plusGood command of English
Application Instructions

Do you?

Like-minded people with a strong passion for the intricacies of software programming and who embrace the idea of positive change, we have been looking for you like, everywhere! If you want to leave a great, life-changing (for you and the many, many, many of our customers) footprint upon the face of the earth (virtually, because we're all about being #ecofriendly), we soooo want to speak with you.
As a Software Developer in Titansoft, you can expect a monthly salary of SGD 5,000 to SGD 6,000
What a Software Developer does in Titansoft
Apply your expertise on our web applications using C#, ASP.NET and SQL
Integrate awesome web applications with database or API-driven back-ends
Design incredible templates for users' ease of use
Enjoy solving problems with your team before they even turn into one
Challenge ideas and spawn something revolutionary
Work in a dynamic, collaborative and non-hierarchical team to break new grounds
What we are looking for in a Software Developer
Experience
0 - 2 years of technical expertise in the software industry (fresh graduates definitely welcome!)
Knowledge and experience on industry best practices, such as Test-Driven Development and Clean Code
What makes a (Super!) Software Developer in Titansoft
Passionate about life and how to make it better through technology
Continuously seek improvements in our products, processes and people
Constantly honing programming techniques and developing new skills
What everyone gets in Titansoft (psst. We didn't get that Best Tech Company to Work for Award in 2017 for nothing!)
18 days of rest and relaxation for each year (P.S. It gets even better over the years!)
Competitive salaries and bonuses bench-marked against big players in the industry (Yeap, those companies!)
Flexible working hours (Sleep in a little longer after fixing that pesky bug from last night)
Comprehensive insurance coverage
Very well-stocked pantry (We've never heard of the term 'Hunger Games', nope)
Communities of Practice and Workshops catered for your growth and learning
Substantial subsidies and programs to keep that creative flow while having fun (Health promotion program, annual overseas company outing, an annual dinner that nobody will ever forget, etc.)
Hardcore work and hardcore fun!
Working at Titansoft will probably be unlike any other careers you have ever had. There are only 10 types of people in the world.

Those who understand binary and those who don't.

Translate these into technical specifications for development and data output validation.
Document interface designs and the supporting artefacts.
Develop, implement, document and support Enterprise Service Infrastructure such as JBoss Fuse / Mulesoft ESB, Java and .NET/C# applications.
Performing troubleshooting and resolving interface and integration issues, including liaising with vendors or other IT Personnel for problem resolution.
Assist the Solution Architect in creating roadmaps to address gaps and service improvement towards a future architecture.

Degree in Computer Science / Engineering or equivalent

EXPERIENCE & ANY SPECIFIC SKILLS SET REQUIRED

Experience in integration with MS/SQL and Oracle PL/SQL.
Understanding of OOA, OOD and design patterns.
Good knowledge of data Security.

Address
81 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore
Map

$1,500 - 2,100 monthly
Company Profile
EVYE is a Professional Branding Consultancy. We are Thinking Brands. We help businesses harness the power in a brand for good. All by Design.
Job Description
If you’re an aspiring designer who loves communicating brand emotion through user experiences, and keeping graphical elements consistent (with flourishes of creativity), then we want you! As design priorities shift towards interaction on screen, we are looking for a Web & Graphic designer to join us and push the quality of graphic design on the web.
We will gel with you if you enjoy:
Solving problems as a team using web, graphic design and UI/UX skills;
Presenting disparate information in neat and effective layouts;
Streamlining brand communications through powerful symbols and graphical elements;
Applying your design skills to help bring the broad concepts and ideas of others into reality; and
Enjoys contributing to and taking away from the marketplace of ideas at the creative workplace
The Scope:
Website Building (WordPress): Design, layout and front-end development (on WordPress) of on-brand websites based on key visuals, concepts and brand guidelines as directed by our Creative Director or Client.
Wireframing & Mockups: Design, illustrate and produce mock-up, wireframes, interactive UI/UX prototypes for client presentation and development.
Graphic Design: Support the creative team in creating, developing and designing graphical assets to support other on-brand collaterals (Brand guidelines, Social media posts, Digital banners, etc)
Maintenance & Technical Support: Support the creative team in maintaining and providing technical support for website whenever necessary.
Liaison works: Assist in communicating with third parties for website-related matters when required.
Don’t worry, you won’t need to be client-facing. So you can focus on doing the good work you do best. We’ll manage the clients.
What You Can Expect:
Supervision and Guidance: We will guide you along the way and develop your skills as a web builder, graphic designer and career professional. We are a team of creative consultants who have been through a lot, and walk the talk too.
Project Ownership: Once you’ve gained more experience, you’ll get the chance to independently develop your own and even take charge of certain projects.
Work with a team of in-house professionals: Need content? Need graphics? Animation? We can do it together as a team. This expands the possibilities of what we can create together.
Outcomes-driven working environment: Rather than focussing on just clocking hours, the proof is in the work delivered and professionalism. So, as long as good work gets done and done on time, we are more than happy to accommodate different working styles.
Long Term Career Goals: We invest quite a lot in our trainees, because we want to build a team that can grow with us, both professionally and holistically.
Apply with us if you are:
Intimately familiar with Adobe XD and front-end development, including using WordPress.
Technically skilled in the Adobe CS software (Photoshop, Illustrator minimum).
Experienced with the principles of good design and layout in the digital space.
Collaborative and communicative team player amongst fellow creative personalities.
Where we work:
Our office is at Launchpad@JTC in one-north. It’s where all the cool start-ups and creative people in Singapore are, and is right next to the one-north MRT station. We also adopt a flexible hybrid work schedule to balance our individual working styles and team collaboration work.
Application Instructions
You will have a higher chance of consideration by applying for this position following the link here:


https://talenttribe.asia/jobs/evye/junior-web-graphic-designer-sgunited-traineeship-J9TVU0

Long Term Career Goals: We invest quite a lot in our trainees, because we want to build a team that can grow with us, both professionally and holistically.
Apply with us if you are:
Intimately familiar with Adobe XD and front-end development, including using WordPress.
Technically skilled in the Adobe CS software (Photoshop, Illustrator minimum).
Experienced with the principles of good design and layout in the digital space.
Collaborative and communicative team player amongst fellow creative personalities.
Where we work:
Our office is at Launchpad@JTC in one-north. It’s where all the cool start-ups and creative people in Singapore are, and is right next to the one-north MRT station. We also adopt a flexible hybrid work schedule to balance our individual working styles and team collaboration work.
 Application Instructions

Company Profile
CareerContact is an early-stage ed-tech platform in Singapore designed to bridge the gap between school and work. We help high school and tertiary students develop digital skills and connect them with SMEs in Southeast Asia. We are a GSV Top 200 Edtech Startup that is also supported by 4.0 Schools and VELA Education Fund. We are also among the 8 teams that received an outstanding award from the National Youth Council of Singapore in 2021.
Job Description
Responsibilities:
Website bug fixes
Fix a few bugs on the organization's PHP customised website
Document written code in a clean and structured manner
Check the website for any unidentified bugs and make the improvements accordingly
Requirements:
Experience working with a PHP customisation website
Database of past web development works
Keen eye for detail
Excellent communication skills
Able to work independently and multitask
Excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills
Compensation:
$225/4 fixes
Time Commitment:
5-6 hours per week for 1-2 months
This position is already closed and no longer available. You may like to view the other latest internships here. Company

job_title: Graphic Designer To Convert Web Logos To Print Ready
listing_jobDesc:
We need a graphic designer that can convert existing logos from websites into a print-ready format.

We also need a graphic designer that can identify the font family used in certain logos (or a similar font) and recreate it.

Finally, we need the graphic designer to add these logos to pre-made business card templates in Adobe Illustrator and update the colors or fonts in the design to match the logo.

We are seeking a long-term arrangement in which we can send 100's of logos on an ongoing basis.

Since this is a very high-volume project, we would need the price per logo to be as low as possible so that we can continue to scale up and increase the number of logos/designs we do.

Please share with us your best price per logo, thank you!
JOB REQUIREMENT
Must be able to convert logos from websites to print ready format.

Must be able to identify the font family used in logos and recreate the logo with the same or very similar font. We need a graphic designer that can convert existing logos from websites into a print-ready format.

We are seeking a long-term arrangement in which we can send 100's of logos on an ongoing basis.

Since this is a very high-volume project, we would need the price per logo to be as low as possible so that we can continue to scale up and increase the number of logos/designs we do.

Please share with us your best price per logo, thank you!

Must be able to convert logos from websites to print ready format.

Must be able to identify the font family used in logos and recreate the logo with the same or very similar font. Show more

Job Description
Industry/ Organization Type: IT/ Consultancy Firm
Position Title: Cloud Engineer/ Cloud Specialist (AWS/ Azure)
Working Location: Tai Seng
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 9.30 am – 7 pm
Salary Package: Up to $9,500 + Bonus + Allowances
Duration: Permanent Role
Key Responsibilities
Incorporate as best practice, continuous improvement process in cloud deployment through monitoring, reporting, evaluating, and improving the cost to performance ratio.
Engage, design and deliver the cloud operation services to customers in accordance with the tender specifications and proposed solutions.
To assist the company in setting up cloud environments in AWS and Azure for Web Applications that are to be deployed in client environments.
Analyse requirements and develop Cloud Solutions for client projects. Setup and Deploy Cloud environments.
Deploy automated scripts for setting the environment
Assist and/or Represent the Company in the technical aspect of your cloud solutions
To understand and research on new Cloud solutions
Prepare documentation e.g. Cloud Design specifications, Cloud Architecture Diagrams, Acceptance Test document and participate in reviews.
Environment System optimization.
Development of custom scripts to meet the new functionalities required by the business.
Setup of Microsoft OS and Microsoft Database
Design and propose IT turnkey solutions based on client requirements
Produce weekly activity reports, oral presentations, briefings, standard operating procedures (SOPs), software development life-cycle (SDLC) documents and checklists, risk and issues logs and required artifacts.
APPLY NOW!!
At least Diploma, preferably in Information Technology or related disciplines
Minimum 2 years of working experience in Cloud Environment Setup and Configuration, and Deployment of applications
AWS and Azure Cloud certifications
Experience in DevOps automation, containerisation and orchestration using tools such as Docker and Kubernetes and CICD Tools
Knowledge in IAC scripts like Terraform
Good understanding of Microsoft Architecture and Framework
Experience in government projects, processes and procedures will be advantageous
Experience in Agile development methods, application deployment, cloud infrastructure, web architecture design and change management
Kindly apply through ANY of the following methods:
Submit your application by clicking the APPLY button;
Email your resume to Job(at)anradus.com.sg . Please indicate #52967 on the email subject.
Anradus Policy: This clarifies Anradus' working procedures, from receiving the applicant's resume, screening to shortlisting. We assure you our consultants will go through every resume we receive but we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

SOFTWARE DEVELOPER/ENGINEER (PHP)
Work with development and product team and build efficient, scalable, reusable PHP modules, APIs and web applications Develop web application using current technology standards
Participate in the complete software development life cycle (SDLC), which includes user requirement analysis, design, coding, testing, deployment, implementation, and documentation
Maintain system & user documentation for module /functions developed.
Evaluate and provide technical feedback on project requirements.
To work as a team as well as work independently to resolve the assigned projects.
To diagnose issues accurately and provide solution to improve the systems efficiency.
To maintain current system; new features, bugs fixing, code refactoring and performance optimization
Take ownership of the overall solution from conception, development to productization

Qualifications
At least 3-5 years of professional experience in web application development.
Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma or Professional Degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or equivalent.
Ability to develop technical and user interface designs for an application that meets the defined requirements.
Strong Object-Oriented Design and Java Development Experience.
Familiar with various common cross-browsers, web standards, practical understanding and experience in usability, accessibility of the web application.

Location: Central
Salary: Depending on experiences

Come join our Front-End Development Team

We're looking for a motivated individual to be part of our highly skilled international team of Front-End Developers. We're passionate about the work that we do and pride ourselves on being great to work with. We can't wait for you to join us!

You'll be part of a team that creates beautiful web experiences and have the opportunity to improve yourself at the same time. With a skill-development tailored just for you, you'll get access to a vast array of learning materials and resources and support from your manager and peers.

You'll be working on our main website that boasts:

Hundreds of millions of visitors each year
Translations in 17 unique languages
Continuous optimization through split testing
Role Responsibilities
Work with an amazing team of developers to implement exciting new features on our websites, microsites, and blog.
Work with designers to develop new features that are easy to use and align with our branding.
Set up A/B tests that drive sales and revenue. Implement the winning test results for web pages and emails.
Ensure web assets (e.g., CSS, images, and javascript) are optimized, so our pages perform better than any competitor's.
Deliver beautiful customer experiences, in part by squashing UI bugs caused by browser-compatibility issues or client/server-side logic.
Role Requirements
Proficiency in spoken and written English
Experience with at least one modern JavaScript framework (React, Vue.js)
Can build consistently excellent UI and UX across various browsers and devices using a combination of CSS, HTML, and JavaScript
Thorough understanding of web performance and optimization techniques
Extensive cross-browser knowledge
Substantial experience using Git for version control
Comfortable working in terminal or from the command line
Able to help other team members work more effectively
Some experience working cross-functionally
Nice to have skills, but not required
Some experience leading people or projects
Experience working with static site generation tools (e.g., Hugo or Gatsby)
Understanding of OOP & async concepts
Experience setting up A/B tests with tools such as Google Optimize
Experience successfully implementing event tracking with Google Analytics
Keen to practice test-driven development (TDD)
Experience building HTML emails
Hiring process

When it comes to hiring processes, "rigorous" and "opaque" are often mistakenly conflated. For us, it's always a mutual exchange, so we think it's important that candidates have a clear understanding of the process and what we're looking for. Learn more about the hiring process by visiting our careers page.

Benefits

Health and happiness go hand in hand, and we make every effort to support our team members in all facets of their lives—both inside and outside the office. Learn more about our employee benefits by visiting our careers page.

Before you apply
At the moment, we do not sponsor visas in the UK and the EU. For Hong Kong, we require at least two years of working experience and a university degree in a related field. For Singapore, we can only sponsor visas for mid-career or above.
Please upload your resume as a PDF and do not include any salary or compensation information in it.

Agile-style development

Nice to have
Development experience using TypeScript and Next.js
Good understanding of state management
Good understanding of React hooks
Ability to speak Japanese (Japan Work Visa option available)

Company
Alt Research is the company building and maintaining the AltLayer Network — an elastic scaling layer for all blockchains. AltLayer equips both EVM (e.g., Ethereum) and non-EVM chains (e.g., Polkadot) with an on-demand execution layer that can handle large surge in transaction processing requests. AltLayer enables dApp developers to quickly spin off a custom execution layer called flash layer to serve users, with near-instant finality (< 2s), low gas fees (< 0.01USD) and high throughput (~2,000 tps).

The project is being developed by blockchain veterans and award-winning researchers, who have previously held key roles at Parity, Zilliqa and Synthetix.

Role
We are looking for top talents to join our fast-growing team to build a scalable future for blockchains. We are currently looking for a self-driven and experienced Smart Contract Developer (Solidity) to develop our flash layer solution for dApp developers. You are expected to work closely with the core team members and deliver secure and reliable smart contracts running on any compatible EVM platform. Some full-stack development is also required for off-chain logics and/or to build user-friendly interfaces. We are based in Singapore but remote working is also acceptable.

This role is open for remote work for candidates located between UTC+2 and UTC+12 (most of the team is based in Asia, and you are expected to adjust your work schedule accordingly).

Responsibilities

Write thorough unit-tests.
Design/implement secure and reliable smart contracts in Solidity.
Static analysis and dynamic analysis of bytecode and source code.
Work with full stack developers to create full-fledged decentralized applications.
Collaborate with other team members to plan projects.
Perform design reviews and code reviews regularly.
Create technical specifications and documentation.

Requirements

Over 3 years of experience in smart contract and dApp development.
Knowledge and experience of Test-Driven Development.
Familiar with the common smart contract vulnerabilities.
Experience of smart contract development framework such as Hardhat or Truffle.
Experience in full-stack web development with Typescript, Node.js and Go. Rust is a plus.
Familiarity with open-source development and collaborations.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Benefits

Competitive base compensation with performance-based incentives.
Highly fulfilling and mission-driven culture.
Fast career path.
Flexible working hours.

COMPANY DESCRIPTION
Beyondsoft International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. was set up in 2007 and established as the regional headquarters for the Southeast Asia (SEA) and European markets in September 2015. Based on our vision of "Using technology to promote social progress, economic development and become a global customer preferred partner" and our concept of "Beyond your expectations", Beyondsoft is committed to provide our customers in countries along the "Belt and Road" with comprehensive solutions and products and creating commercial value for customers to realizing continuous businesses development.
Our core business includes:
IT development servicesProviding customers with IT consulting, software research and development, software and hardware testing, system integration and operation and maintenance, data analysis and other services;
New retail solutions and productsThrough intelligent products, helping small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) realize the digital transformation of their daily operations;
Internet of Things (IoT) platform and solutionsComprehensive use of IoT, artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing and other technologies to provide IoT solutions for intelligent upgrades in cities, parks, buildings and industries, to create a smart future.
For more information, please visit www.beyondsoft.com.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Writing effective and scalable Python codes
Designing and implementing robust applications
Debugging applications to ensure low-latency and high-availability
Integrating user-facing elements with server-side logic
Implementing security and data protection
Accommodating various data storage solutions
QUALIFICATIONS
2 years of experience with python development
Experienced with development of responsive web applications
Experience with Flutter will be added advantage
Experience with React or Vue js will be added advantage Familiar with frontend web technologies (html, css, js, bootstrap and jQuery)
Familiar with flask, Django

RESPONSIBILITIES
Define the user experience, interactions, and user interface through user flows, information architecture, sketches and wireframes, and visual design
Build functional prototypes to validate and test your designs
Participate in user research and testing
Regular review of usage data to analyse user behaviour and pain points
Help maintain visual and brand consistency between all products and outlets
Collaborate with stakeholders to translate business goals into unique product experiences
Work hand in hand with marketing team to come out with unique marketing campaigns and / or assist in basic marketing task during free time
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE
Ability to convey design ideas via sketches, storyboards, high-fidelity mockups or prototypes
Excellent aesthetic judgment and willingness to collaborate within a team environment and/or take the lead
A compelling portfolio of work that demonstrates design work that you feel proud of, that also tells a story that you are a deep design thinker
Strong information presentation (visual and written) skills to convey design decisions to relevant stakeholders
Experience with Adobe XD, Figma
About the company
You'll be working within the holding company's subsidiary technology company dealing in automobiles, blockchain and more.

We do not look at qualifications, if you're young but take pride in your work. Have the above mentioned skills, submit in your resume! We require your design juice not your education level.

As our Web Designer , you will be working closely with the business (product owner) and frontend
developer(s) to create refreshingly professional and user-friendly web & mobile user interfaces. The nature of our work will be fast-paced and you will be given multiple tasks simultaneously – prioritizing tasks & time management is important. You constantly challenge yourself to collaborate better with the team, explore new possibilities for better product quality, and succeed with the team.

Job Role & Responsibilities:
Design and Build new websites
Manage, maintain and upgrade existing WordPress websites
Design and create new icons, logos, banners, brochures, videos, instruction manuals and presentation materials for our products (software & services)
Mockups for web applications and mobile apps (enhance the UI only - product owner will provide rough sketch and explanation of the functions and features)

Specific Skills Required:
Proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
Proficient in WordPress (Experience with Elementor is a plus)
Proficient in MS Power Point (especially with animations)
Experience in Web Hosting using e.g. Wix, Bluehost
Strong communication and creative problem-solving skills
Tremendously positive attitude
